Package storm.asynchbase.trident.state

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncHBaseMapState<T>
    This is a TridentState implementation backed by HBase using AsyncHBase client.
    AsyncHBaseMapState.Factory
    This factory handle state creation.
    AsyncHBaseMapState.Options<T>
    cacheSize : size of the LRU CachedMap timeout : timeout while doing multiget/multiput in milliseconds cluster : AsyncHBase client to use.
    AsyncHBaseState
    This is a TridentState implementation to persist a partition to HBase using AsyncHBase client.
    You should only use this state if your update is idempotent regarding batch replay.
    AsyncHBaseState.Options
    cluster : AsyncHBase client to use.
    AsyncHBaseStateFactory
    Factory to handle creation of AsyncHBaseState objects
    AsyncHBaseStateQuery
    This function is used to query an AsyncHBaseState with TridentStream.stateQuery(State, StateQuery,...)
    AsyncHBaseStateUpdater
    Update an AsyncHBaseStateUpdater
    Use this function with Stream.partitionAggregate(State,Aggregator,StateUpdater,...)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AsyncHBaseMapState.Options.FailStrategy  
    AsyncHBaseState.Options.FailStrategy  
    AsyncHBaseStateQuery.FailStrategy
